allow: Bash(powershell -Command "Get-Process -Name node -ErrorAction SilentlyContinue | Where-Object { $_CommandLine -like ''*next*'' } | Stop-Process -Force; Start-Sleep -Seconds 2")

Bash(git commit -m "$\(cat <<''EOF''
Initial commit: CodeReve Management System

- NestJS backend with complete RBAC \(Admin, Manager, Team Lead, Developer, Designer\)
- Next.js frontend with role-based dashboards
- PostgreSQL database with Prisma ORM
- Real-time notifications via WebSocket
- n8n webhook integration for automation
- Electron desktop app wrapper
- Docker compose for local development

Co-Authored-By: Claude Opus 4.5 <noreply@anthropic.com>
EOF
\)")

Bash(git commit -m "$\(cat <<''EOF''
Add comprehensive README documentation

- Project overview and key features
- Complete tech stack documentation
- System architecture diagram
- Role-based access control matrix
- Project structure explanation
- Getting started guide
- Environment configuration
- Database setup instructions
- Deployment guides \(Vercel, Railway, Render\)
- API documentation overview
- WebSocket events reference
- n8n automation setup
- Desktop app build instructions
- Troubleshooting guide

Co-Authored-By: Claude Opus 4.5 <noreply@anthropic.com>
EOF
\)")
